variables.name: AllFeatures
variables.defaultValue:
{
  args: {
    nzData: sampleData,
    columns: columns,
    showChecked: true,
    nzShowPagination: true,
    nzShowSizeChanger: true,
  },
  render: (args) => ({
    props: args,
    template: `
      <wn-frontend-table
        [nzData]="nzData"
        [columns]="columns"
        [showChecked]="showChecked"
        [nzShowPagination]="nzShowPagination"
        [nzShowSizeChanger]="nzShowSizeChanger"
      ></wn-frontend-table>
    `,
  }),
}

        [columns]="columns"

        [nzFooter]="nzFooter"

}
